name: googlebooks-app
description: A Fullstack MERN search engine that can be used to find potential books to read. Users can create an account, search for books and save them to a personal list for future reference.

scripts.start: npm run install && npm run build && (cd ./server && npm run start)
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
